name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee
display_help: You can use Energy Melee to power your blows with pure energy. These focused power attacks often Disorient opponents.

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Barrage
powers.display_help: You perform a quick punch that deals moderate damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 2 ticks of 20.85 smashing damage over 0.3s on target
2 ticks of 6.67 energy damage over 0.3s on target
2 ticks of 33.23 smashing damage over 0.3s on target
2 ticks of 11.08 energy damage over 0.3s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 7.15s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target
2 ticks of 12.39 fire damage over 0.3s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Energy_Punch
powers.display_help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 5.96s on target
30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Bone_Smasher
powers.display_help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 9.54s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Whirling_Hands
powers.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 5.96s on target
30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Total_Focus
powers.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Stun
powers.display_help: By focusing your internal energy on your fists, you can turn them into personal tasers. This Stun attack deals minor damage, but has the best chance to Disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Energy_Melee.Energy_Transfer
powers.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP

display_info: 156.40 special damage on self after 0.1s delay
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 9.54s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 2s on target
